subject: Giro d''Italia (Bicycle Race)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: David Arroyo bent, bent, bent and finally broke Friday in the Giro d'Italia bike race, losing his hold on the leader's pink jersey after a monstrous climb and a fierce descent.
snippet: David Arroyo bent, bent, bent and finally broke Friday in the Giro d'Italia bike race, losing his hold on the leader's pink jersey after a monstrous climb and a fierce descent.
